p: Another pathophysiological mechanism in T2DM is the protein PED/PEA-15. This protein is increased in many cells (skeletal muscles, adipocytes, skin fibroblasts, and peripheral blood leukocytes) in T2DM patients. A recent study showed that rats overexpressing this protein had a reduction in dopaminergic activity, a fact that may induce the development of PD [ 40].
